John Mark Moore bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke mmasị ya maka ndụ anụ ọhịa na ihe nketa okike na-ejikọta isiokwu nke ime mmụọ na ihe omimi
John bụ Master Printmaker ma nwekwa ọkwa nkuzi na Crawford College na Lonehill, Wits Technikon, St
O nyeere Philippa Hobbs aka dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ, site na 1993 ruo 1996.
Na mgbakwunye na ihe ngosi nke anụ ọhịa na nsogbu nke ụdị ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ, ọrụ ya na-agụnyekarị ihe nrụtụ aka nke ihe nketa San- na Koi- bushman nke Southern Africa
Ọ na-anọchite anya okike site n'echiche

Ụdị ya nwere ihe ndị dị na surreal, esemokwu dị n'etiti esoteric polymorphism na ọdịnala nke o kwenyere na ọ na-enye onye na-ekiri ohere ịchọta nkọwa nke ọrụ ahụ ma nye ya ohere ịgwa ha okwu n'onwe ha.
Ebe ọ tolitere na Johannesburg ma nọrọ ọtụtụ ezumike n'ime ọhịa, mmekọrịta ya na anụ ọhịa dugara n'ọchịchọ na-arịwanye elu ịmepụta nka anụ ọhịa na-egosi mmekọrịta ha na okike
Ọ họọrọ usoro obibi akwụkwọ n'ihi na ọ na-enyere mmadụ aka ịmepụta mbipụta ma ya mere ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịnweta ya.

O nyela World Wildlife Fund (WWF) na Endangered Wildlife Trust (EWT) onyinye ego ma mepụta ọrụ ụfọdụ maka ịnakọta ego ọrụ ebere, dịka, Red Nose Day ebe eji ọrụ ahụ eme ihe dị ka mgbasa ozi na bọọdụ na South Africa dum
O mekwara ọrụ maka Life Line
Ọ rụchara ọrụ maka Nelson Mandela Children's Fund, nke e nyere ọrụ ebere
Onyinye ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ ihe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ maka ụbọchị ọrịa AIDS nke mba
O nweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, ma nke onwe ya ma na njikọta ya na ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ, na South Africa na mba ofesi.
